RibbonBar Class Reference

(Qtitan::RibbonBar)

RibbonBar class represents a component Ribbon UI used in Microsoft Office 2007/2010. Please note, after the ribbon bar has been added to the main window you need to setup the Ribbon's style (or MS-Office Style) to the application. To do that please use the following code: More...

    #include <Qtitan>

Detailed Description

RibbonBar class represents a component Ribbon UI used in Microsoft Office 2007/2010. Please note, after the ribbon bar has been added to the main window you need to setup the Ribbon's style (or MS-Office Style) to the application. To do that please use the following code:

    QApplication app(...);
    app.setStyle(new Qtitan::RibbonStyle());

or

    QApplication app(...);
    app.setStyle("ribbonstyle");

Note: To display RibbonBar correctly the Ribbon style (or Office style) should be installed into your application by calling qApp.setStyle(new Qtitan::RibbonStyle()); or app.setStyle("ribbonstyle"); RibbonBar does not work with platform's specific or standard Qt styles.

Member Function Documentation

RibbonBar::RibbonBar ( QWidget * parent = Q_NULL )

Constructs RibbonBar object with the given parent.

RibbonBar::~RibbonBar () [virtual]

Destructor of the RibbonBar object.

QAction * RibbonBar::addAction ( const QIcon & icon, const QString & text, Qt::ToolButtonStyle style, QMenu * menu = Q_NULL )

Add button in the upper part of RibbonBar. Parameter icon specifies the icon on the button. Parameter text specifies the button text. Parameter style specifies the button style. menu - pointer to the menu. Function returns a pointer to an object QAction.

QMenu * RibbonBar::addMenu ( const QString & text )

Add the menu at the top right RibbonBar with a given text. Returns a pointer to an object QMenu.

RibbonPage * RibbonBar::addPage ( const QString & text )

Add a new page on RibbonBar. Parameter text is used to initialize the page title. The function returns a pointer to the new object RibbonPage.

void RibbonBar::addPage ( RibbonPage * page )

Add new page to the RibbonBar. \p page - is a pointer to the RibbonPage object.

QAction * RibbonBar::addSystemButton ( const QString & text )

Add system button to the upper left part of RibbonBar. Parameter text specifies the text on the system button. Function returns a pointer to the QAction object.

QAction * RibbonBar::addSystemButton ( const QIcon & icon, const QString & text )

Add system button to the upper left part of RibbonBar with icon. Parameter text specifies the text on the system button. Parameter icon specifies the icon. Function returns a pointer to the QAction object.

void RibbonBar::changeEvent ( QEvent * event ) [virtual protected]

void RibbonBar::clearPages ()

Clear all pages in the ribbon bar.

void RibbonBar::currentPageChanged ( int index ) [signal]

The signal is emitted when the active page on RibbonBar was changed. Parameter \p index - the index of the new active page.

void RibbonBar::currentPageChanged ( RibbonPage * page ) [signal]

void RibbonBar::detachPage ( RibbonPage * page )

Removes page from the ribbon by the given page. Important: The function does not destroy the page, but sets the parent to the NULL.

void RibbonBar::detachPage ( int index )

Removes page from the ribbon by the given index. Important: The function does not destroy the page, but sets the parent to the NULL.

bool RibbonBar::event ( QEvent * e ) [virtual protected]

Reimplemented from QObject::event().

bool RibbonBar::eventFilter ( QObject * object, QEvent * event ) [virtual protected]

Reimplemented from QObject::eventFilter().

RibbonPage * RibbonBar::getPage ( int index ) const

Get a pointer to the page at the specified position. Parameter \p index is the page index.

int RibbonBar::getPageCount () const

Returns the number of pages in RibbonBar.

RibbonQuickAccessBar * RibbonBar::getQuickAccessBar () const

Get a reference to the Quick Access Toolbar. Returns a pointer to an object RibbonQuickAccessBar.

RibbonSystemButton * RibbonBar::getSystemButton () const

Returns pointer to the system button.

int RibbonBar::heightForWidth ( int ) const [virtual]

Reimplemented from QWidget::heightForWidth().

RibbonPage * RibbonBar::insertPage ( int index, const QString & text )

Create a new page with the text title and insert it into the position index. The function returns a pointer to the new object RibbonPage.

void RibbonBar::insertPage ( int index, RibbonPage * page )

Insert a new page at the specified position of the RibbonBar. \p index - the position of the page, \p page - a pointer to the new object RibbonPage.

bool RibbonBar::isBackstageVisible () const

bool RibbonBar::isFrameThemeEnabled () const

Returs the enable state for hte Office 2007 frame. Used on the Windows platform only.

bool RibbonBar::isKeyTipsComplement () const

bool RibbonBar::isMinimizationEnabled () const

Returns the flag of the minimization feature of the Ribbon.

bool RibbonBar::isQuickAccessVisible () const

Return the visible state of the quick access toolbar. Return true, if the quick access toolbar is visible.

bool RibbonBar::isTitleBarVisible () const

Returns the visible state for the title bar of the ribbon. By default it is true.

bool RibbonBar::isVisible () const

void RibbonBar::maximize ()

Maximize the Ribbon if it has been minimized before.

void RibbonBar::minimizationChanged ( bool minimized ) [signal]

The signal is used to get notification about changes of the minimization state of the Ribbon. The minimized parameter holds the current state of the minimization.

void RibbonBar::minimize ()

Minimize the Ribbon if it has been maximized before.

void RibbonBar::mouseDoubleClickEvent ( QMouseEvent * event ) [virtual protected]

void RibbonBar::mousePressEvent ( QMouseEvent * event ) [virtual protected]

void RibbonBar::movePage ( RibbonPage * page, int newIndex )

Moves the page from current position to the position newIndex.

void RibbonBar::movePage ( int index, int newIndex )

Moves the page in the position index to the position newIndex.

void RibbonBar::paintEvent ( QPaintEvent * p ) [virtual protected]

Reimplemented from QWidget::paintEvent().

Draws the contents of the RibbonBar.

void RibbonBar::removePage ( RibbonPage * page )

Removes the page. Parameter page is a pointer to page that will be removed. The object that is referenced by page, will be destroyed.

void RibbonBar::removePage ( int index )

Remove page at the given index. An object that represents the page at position index will be destroyed.

void RibbonBar::resizeEvent ( QResizeEvent * e ) [virtual protected]

Reimplemented from QWidget::resizeEvent().

void RibbonBar::setFrameThemeEnabled ( bool enable = true )

Enables display Office 2007 frame. Used on the Windows platform only.

See also isFrameThemeEnabled().

void RibbonBar::setKeyTipsComplement ( bool complement )

See also isKeyTipsComplement().

void RibbonBar::setMinimizationEnabled ( bool enabled )

See also isMinimizationEnabled().

void RibbonBar::setMinimizedFlag ( bool flag ) [protected]

void RibbonBar::setTitleBarVisible ( bool show )

Sets the visible state for the ribbon title in case then the Office frame is not used.

See also isTitleBarVisible().

void RibbonBar::showQuickAccess ( bool show = true )

Show/Hide the Quick Access Toolbar. Parameter show is true, to show the Quick Access Toolbar, false, to hide. By default, the show parameter is true.

QSize RibbonBar::sizeHint () const [virtual]

Reimplemented from QWidget::sizeHint().
